name: Snowed * In
description:
SNOWD * IN
 is a relaxing walking simulator with a (sad) story focus.
you explore the branches of the last expedition that didn't come back...
__________________________________________________
there is little gameplay for more reading.
there may be problems with the camera,
which i unfortunately saw too late. I hope that you can look over it 
and that it doesn't break the atmosphere..
this game was made for Winter Jam 2022
(and sorry if there are mistakes in the text)
Have fun playing it
____________
